translations: 分裂主义者，独立主义者
分裂主义的，独立主义的

sentences.sentence: Separatist movements are a threat to the integrity of the nation.
sentences.translation: 分裂活动是对国家领土完整的威胁。

sentences.sentence: There is an outright separatist party but it only scored around about 10 percent in the vote.
sentences.translation: 有一个极端分离主义党派，但是该党在选举中只取得了大约10%的选票。

sentences.sentence: Spanish police say they have arrested ten people suspected of being members of the Basque separatist movement.
sentences.translation: 西班牙警方说，他们已经逮捕了10名巴斯克独立运动的嫌疑分子。
